title: Sadiq Khan – 2022 Comments on Millennium Mills and Silvertown Development
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Sadiq Khan, the Mayor of London, on 5 July 2022.
content:
I am delighted to see work getting underway at this landmark East London location that has vexed planners and politicians alike for the last 40 years.
